sources.title: Aflac expects no brand spillover effect from Japan Post turmoil
sources.snippet: Aflac Inc. does not expect the probe into and management changeover at Japan Post Holdings Co. Ltd. to hurt Aflac's brand in Japan. Japan Post's CEO and senior vice president stepped down in December 2019 after an investigation determined that some sales staff used improper tactics to sell life insurance, including some Aflac insurance policies.
